Title: Prohibits the eviction of small commercial tenants in the city of New York without good cause
Summary: Prohibits the eviction of small commercial tenants in the city of New York without good cause.
LawCode: Add Title 22 Chapter 12 §§22-1201 - 22-1206, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting eviction without good cause for commercial tenants
